title: 7+ Healthy Smoothie Recipes to Make for Breakfast
description: Healthy smoothie recipes provide an ideal fix for anyone looking for something nutritious to eat, stat. Throw a few ingredients into a blender, grab a glass, and you’re ready to go in just a few seconds. Easy, right? But not all smoothies will help you meet your nutritional (or weight loss) goals. In fact, many pre-made smoothies (and smoothie bowls) you find at the store are loaded with excess sugar and don't have enough fiber, protein or fat to keep you satiated.Good news: If you’re looking for healthy smoothies for weight loss or just a delicious way to start your day, we have expert-approved tips, tricks, and ingredients to toss into your blender.

content.name: Tropical Chia Smoothie
content.description: Make this morning drink the night before: The fiber-packed chia seeds will absorb the liquid for a thick and satisfying sip.

ingredients.2: 2 ripe mangoes, peeled and cut into chunks (about 11 oz)
ingredients.4: 1 cups cashew milk or milk of choice, plus more for serving

steps.step1: Heat oven or toaster oven to 350°F. Spread coconut on small parchment-lined baking sheet. Bake, tossing halfway through,until golden brown, 3 to 15min minutes. Let cool.
steps.step2: In blender, puree mangoes, passion fruit, milk, maple syrup, vanilla, and salt until smooth.
steps.step3: Place chia seeds in medium bowl and whisk in mango mixture. Refrigerate half an hour or overnight.
steps.step4: Stir coconut into chia-mango mixture, adjusting consistency with more milk if necessary. Divide between glasses.

content.name: Berry, Chia and Mint Smoothie
content.description: The beauty of this bold, red smoothie is that you can handle all the prep way in advance. Keep the sliced strawberries, grated beets, and chia seeds in the freezer until you’re ready to add milk and blend. Bonus: This drink will give you a ton of gut-friendly fiber, too.

ingredients.6: 1 cups unsweetened almond milk or milk of choice

steps.step1: Place berries, beet, mint, and chia seeds in resealable plastic bag or freezer-safe jar. Freeze overnight or longer.
steps.step2: When ready to prepare, add almond milk to blender, then add frozen ingredients. Blend until smooth. Serve in two tall glasses.

content.name: Green Pineapple Coconut Smoothie
content.description: Looking to get more greens into your diet? This fruity beverage packs in a whole cup of baby spinach per serving—but you'll barely taste it. Instead, your taste buds will be focused on the tropical flavors that the pineapple, coconut, banana, and lime are bringing to the equation..

steps.step1: In blender, puree all ingredients until smooth. Divide between two glasses.

content.name: Green Ginger Smoothie
content.description: Baby spinach and Granny Smith apples combine to create the delicious green color of this smoothie. Hemp seeds add a dose of plant protein and healthy fats.

steps.step1: In blender, puree all ingredients until smooth. Divide between two glasses.

content.name: Cranberry Banana Smoothie
content.description: Frozen cranberries are an excellent way to savor the taste of fall, year-round. The berry adds fiber and flavor to this smoothie, while the banana gives it a rich, creamy texture, and maple syrup adds the perfect amount of sweetness.

steps.step1: In a blender, puree cranberries, almond milk, banana, maple syrup, ice..

content.name: Tropical Papaya Perfection Smoothie
content.description: This protein and fiber-rich smoothie is the perfect light breakfast or midday pick-me-up. Plus, it doesn’t hurt that sipping on this glass of sunshine might just make you feel like you’re on a tropical island far away.

steps.step1: Cut 1 papaya into chunks and blend it with 1 cup of fat-free, plain yogurt, 1/2 cup fresh pineapple chunks, 1/2 cup crushed ice, 1 tsp. coconut extract, and 1 tsp. ground flaxseed. Process the mixture for about 30 seconds, or until it’s smooth and frosty.

content.name: Berry Good Workout Smoothie
content.description: Get the energy you need to power through your workout in minutes with this easy-to-make smoothie recipe. For an extra dose of calcium

steps.step1: In blender, puree all ingredients until smooth. Divide between two glasses.

content.name: Tutti-Frutti Smoothie
content.description: A splash of orange juice infuses citrus into this healthy and refreshing snack.

ingredients.2: 1/2 cup canned crushed pineapple in juice

steps.step1: Process for about two minutes, or until smooth. The recipe serves 2. (To cut back on sugar, omit the orange juice and canned pineapple and use fresh pineapple.
